x = int(input())
n = int(input())

megabytes = x

for i in range(n):
    p = int(input())
    megabytes = megabytes - p
    if megabytes < 0:
        megabytes = 0

print(megabytes)

#initialize
megabytes = int(input())
months = int(input())

#initialize array
array = []

#add each of the first N months to array
for i in range(months):
    array.append(int(input()))

#compute sum of array
array_sum = sum(array)

#compute difference between sum and megabytes
difference = megabytes - array_sum

#compute 
result = difference * (months + 1)

#print result
print(result)

x = int(input())
n = int(input())

sum = x
for i in range(n):
    sum -= int(input())

print(sum)

x = int(input())
n = int(input())

total = x * n

for i in range(n):
    total -= int(input())

print(total)

x = int(input())
n = int(input())

total = x

for i in range(n):
    total += int(input())

print(total)
